metadata.name: ReFi Barcelona | ReFi UNCONFERENCE Barcelona 2024
metadata.description: The ReFi Unconference Barcelona, organized by the ReFi Barcelona Local Node with the Crypto Commons Association and Trusted Seed, linked local ecological movements to the global ReFi ecosystem. The event included workshops on ReFi, Web3, and public goods. Notable highlights were a tree potting workshop by Silvi's Operation WebTree and discussions on the future of regenerative finance, igniting a dynamic start to the year for the ReFi Barcelona Local Node.
